name: Promethium
description: Inspired by classic Commodore 64 and arcade games, Promethium is a hard-as-nails retro inspired side-scrolling shoot-em-up that takes place over numerous levels that get harder and harder. If you’re after a nice calm casual game this isn’t it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz, or equivalent. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB, or equivalent. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 3.6 GHz, or equivalent. Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 970 GTX , or equivalent. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
